      • originateShareWithCampaign

        public void originateShareWithCampaign(java.lang.String utm_campaign,
                              java.lang.String shareUrl,
                              IGrowth IGrowth)
        Use originateShareWithCampaign to get the share URL.
        Parameters:
        utm_campaign - Id to be used in StreetHawk Analytics (optional)
        shareUrl - deeplink uri of page to be opened when referred user installs the application on his device (optional)
        IGrowth - instance of IGrowth. If null, the API automatically fires and intent with Intent.ACTION_SEND

      • originateShareWithCampaign

        public void originateShareWithCampaign(java.lang.String utm_campaign,
                              java.lang.String URI,
                              java.lang.String utm_source,
                              java.lang.String utm_medium,
                              java.lang.String utm_term,
                              java.lang.String campaign_content,
                              java.lang.String default_url,
                              IGrowth object)
        Use originateShareWithCampaign to get the share URL.
        Parameters:
        utm_campaign - Id to be used in StreetHawk Analytics (optional)
        URI - deeplink uri of page to be opened when referred user installs the application on his device (optional)
        utm_source - Source on which url will be posted (Example facebook, twitter whatsapp etc)
        utm_medium - medium as url will be posted. (Example cpc)
        utm_term - keywords for campaing
        campaign_content - contents of campaign
        default_url - Fallback url if user opens url on non mobile devices.
        object - instance of IStreetHawkGrowth. If null, the API automatically fires and intent with Intent.ACTION_SEND
